answer: <p>Set the <code>width</code> and set <code>margin-left</code> and <code>margin-right</code> to <code>auto</code>. That's <strong>for horizontal only</strong>, though. If you want both ways, you'd just do it both ways. Don't be afraid to experiment; it's not like you'll break anything.</p>
<p>It cannot be centered if you don't give it a width. Otherwise, it will take, by default, the whole horizontal space.</p>
